text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea lepidota (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Light Red Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Indonesia and Malaysia.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea lepidota". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33122A9759022. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33122A9759022.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
